languages.text: "Ваши служки несколько нерасторопны в вопросах ухода за Навис Нобилите, но вполне сносны. Благодарю за заботу".

traits.locale_text: "Ваши служки несколько нерасторопны в вопросах ухода за Навис Нобилите, но вполне сносны. Благодарю за заботу".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."
languages.original_text: "Ваши служки несколько нерасторопны в вопросах ухода за Навис Нобилите, но вполне сносны. Благодарю за заботу".

traits.locale_text: "Your serfs are somewhat languid when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."

traits.locale_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."

traits.locale_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Diener sind etwas träge, wenn es darum geht, einer Adligen der Navis Nobilite zu dienen, doch sie sind durchaus passabel. Danke für Eure Sorge."
languages.original_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Diener sind etwas träge, wenn es darum geht, einer Adligen der Navis Nobilite zu dienen, doch sie sind durchaus passabel. Danke für Eure Sorge."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vos serviteurs ne manifestent pas un grand empressement pour s'occuper d'une noble de la Navis Nobilite, mais ils sont convenables. Merci pour votre sollicitude. »
languages.original_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."

traits.locale_text: « Vos serviteurs ne manifestent pas un grand empressement pour s'occuper d'une noble de la Navis Nobilite, mais ils sont convenables. Merci pour votre sollicitude. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “若论侍奉导航宗族的贵族女士这方面，你的仆人多少有些怠慢，但也勉强可用。感谢你的关心。”
languages.original_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."

traits.locale_text: “若论侍奉导航宗族的贵族女士这方面，你的仆人多少有些怠慢，但也勉强可用。感谢你的关心。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}様の使用人は、航宙貴族の女性に仕えるにはいくぶん鈍いところがありますが、十分我慢できるものです。お気遣いありがとうございます」
languages.original_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様の使用人は、航宙貴族の女性に仕えるにはいくぶん鈍いところがありますが、十分我慢できるものです。お気遣いありがとうございます」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Sus sirvientes son algo perezosos cuando se trata de atender a una noble de la Navis Nobilite, pero no a niveles intolerables. Gracias por su preocupación».
languages.original_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."

traits.locale_text: «Sus sirvientes son algo perezosos cuando se trata de atender a una noble de la Navis Nobilite, pero no a niveles intolerables. Gracias por su preocupación».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."

languages.text: "Hizmetkârların, bir Navis Nobilite soylusuna hizmet için nispeten uyuşuk kalsalar da müsamaha gösterilebilir durumdalar. Sorduğun için teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "Your servants are somewhat sluggish when it comes to attending a noblewoman of the Navis Nobilite, but they are quite tolerable. Thank you for your concern."
